author: Samuel R
title: Great location and hotel, shame about the service
text:
I keep on telling myself I should try other hotels in this part of London and there certainly is enough choice but I keep on coming back here.
I tried the online check in / check out for the first time and it worked flawlessly. I requested a room with a bath that looked into the parking (quieter than those facing the road) and that what I got. The hotel is convenient to London City Airport by taxi or train.
Their are restaurants all around and a M&S store just around the corner. The staff are friendly and helpful and I noticed all new towels in the rooms.
Room Tip: Floor one, odd numbered rooms face into the parking See more room tips Green Features: Using RFID tags on their towels and linen - not to stop theft but rather to control usage and cleaning.
